p: Numerous animal research projects demonstrated the anti-oxidant features of gum resin extracts of B. serrata ( 23, 24). Pandey et al. showed that the extracts of B. serrata gum resin resulted in a reduction in serum cholesterol and the enhancement of HDL in the rats ( 25). Another research indicated that patients with type 2 diabetes who have been supplemented with gum resin of B. serrata for six weeks experienced a remarkable decline of fasting blood glucose and the augmentation in plasma insulin level ( 26).
